AMOUNT.description: Amount to be paid by the client

RETURN_URL.description: URL to where the client in redirect if the payment is successful

CANCEL_URL.description: URL to where the client in redirect if the payment is cancelled

CURRENCY.description: Three characthers currency code. Default value is 'EUR'. [https://www.xe.com/iso4217.php]

NAME.description: Checkout item's name. Default value is "Item". This parameter is required if you fill any other "ITEM_n" parameter with the same 'n'. ['n' is the sequencial number of the item and it can be between 0 and 9 (up to 10 items)]

PRICE.description: Checkout item's price. Default value is the one given in 'AMOUNT'. This parameter is required if you fill any other "ITEM_n" parameter with the same 'n'. ['n' is the sequencial number of the item and it can be between 0 and 9 (up to 10 items)]

QUANTITY.description: Checkout item's quantity. Default value is 1. This parameter is not required at any situation. ['n' is the sequencial number of the item and it can be between 0 and 9 (up to 10 items)]

URL.description: Checkout item's URL to your domain. This parameter is not required at any situation. ['n' is the sequencial number of the item and it can be between 0 and 9 (up to 10 items)]

201.description: A JSON containing a TOKEN that indentifies the Checkout

400.description: A JSON containing a ERROR that indentifies the problem

get.description: Gets checkout details such as who paid and billing address

200.description: A JSON containing buyer information and checkout status (not defined yet)

400.description: A JSON containing a ERROR that indentifies the problem

get.description: Confirm and execute payment. Returns Success or Failure.

200.description: A JSON containing result of payment

400.description: A JSON containing a ERROR that indentifies the problem
